attributes.action: Award the building of a Super Casino to Blackpool - The town most deserving of regeneration.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The casino had to address a need for regeneration in the area, which was likely to have high levels of unemployment and social deprivation. Blackpool is in dire need of regeneration and unlike manchester has not had millions spent on in previous years, the town can barely afford to keep it famous tramway running.
